title: Coronavirus and how people spent their time under lockdown
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: Experimental results of the pilot Office for National Statistics (ONS) online time-use study (collected 28 March to 26 April 2020 across Great Britain) compared with the 2014 to 2015 UK time-use study.
sizingNotes: Simple table structures, no footnotes, straightforward dimensions.
datasetNotes: Dataset is on landing page under heading "Your download option".
